contentrichtext.text: '''U of L''' may refer to: ;Austria * [[University of Leoben]] * [[University of Linz]] ;Canada * [[University of Lethbridge]] in Lethbridge, Alberta ;Ireland * [[University of Limerick]] in Castletroy, Limerick ;Latvia * [[University of Latvia]] ;Portugal * [[Lisbon University|University of Lisbon]] ;South Africa * [[University of Limpopo]] ;United Kingdom * [[University of Leeds]] * [[University of Leicester]] * [[University of Lincoln]] * [[University of Liverpool]] * [[University of London]] ;United States * [[University of Louisiana at Lafayette]] * [[University of Louisville]] in [[Louisville, Kentucky|Louisville]], [[Kentucky]] ==See also== * [[UL (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation|school}}
